orders.question: How long does shipping take?
orders.answer: Standard shipping usually takes 3-5 business days within the US. International shipping typically takes 7-14 business days depending on the destination country.

orders.question: Do you offer express shipping?
orders.answer: Yes, we offer express shipping options at checkout. Express shipping typically delivers within 1-2 business days domestically.

orders.question: How can I track my order?
orders.answer: Once your order ships, you will receive a shipping confirmation email with a tracking number and link to track your package.

orders.question: Do you ship internationally?
orders.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. International shipping rates and delivery times vary by location.

returns.question: What is your return policy?
returns.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. Products must be in their original, unused condition with all tags attached.

returns.question: How do I initiate a return?
returns.answer: To initiate a return, log into your account, go to your orders, and select the "Return Item" option. Alternatively, you can contact our customer service team.

returns.question: How long does it take to process a refund?
returns.answer: Once we receive your returned item, refunds typically process within 3-5 business days, depending on your payment method.

returns.question: Are return shipping costs covered?
returns.answer: For defective items or errors on our part, return shipping is covered. For other returns, customers are responsible for return shipping costs.

products.question: Are your watches water-resistant?
products.answer: Most of our watches are water-resistant, but the specific rating varies by model. Please check the product description for detailed information.

products.question: What is the warranty period for your products?
products.answer: All our products come with a standard 1-year warranty against manufacturing defects. Premium watches have an extended 2-year warranty.

products.question: Are replacement parts available for your products?
products.answer: Yes, we offer replacement parts for most products within the warranty period. Please contact customer service with your specific requirements.

products.question: How do I care for my leather bag?
products.answer: We recommend regular cleaning with a soft cloth, avoiding water exposure, and occasional conditioning with a leather conditioner to maintain quality and appearance.

account.question: How do I create an account?
account.answer: You can create an account by clicking the "Account" icon in the top right corner of our website and selecting "Create Account", or during the checkout process.

account.question: What payment methods do you accept?
account.answer: We accept major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay.

account.question: Is my payment information secure?
account.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and security protocols to protect all customer data and payment information.

account.question: How can I reset my password?
account.answer: Click the "Account" icon, select "Sign In", then click "Forgot Password" and follow the instructions sent to your email.
